description.italian: Distruggi 100 uova aliene
description.japanese: エイリアンの卵を100個壊す

description.english: Use all types of runes
description.schinese: 使用所有类型的符文
description.tchinese: 使用所有類型的符文

description.german: Verwende alle Arten von Runen
description.italian: Utilizza ogni tipo di runa
description.japanese: すべてのタイプのルーンを使う
description.spanish: Usa todos los tipos de runas

description.english: Destroy 100 enemies using runes
description.schinese: 通过符文击杀100名敌人
description.tchinese: 通過符文擊殺100名敵人

description.german: Zerstöre 100 Feinde mit Runen
description.italian: Sconfiggi 100 nemici utilizzando le rune
description.japanese: ルーンを使って敵を100体倒す
description.spanish: Destruye 100 enemigos usando runas

description.english: Take 10,000 dot damage to the bubble
description.schinese: 通过泡泡承受10,000点持续伤害
description.tchinese: 通過泡泡承受10,000點持續傷害
description.french: Subissez 10 000 dégâts sur la durée avec votre bulle

description.italian: Prendi 10.000 di danno DoT con la tua bolla
description.japanese: 泡を使って、10,000回徐々にダメージを受ける
description.spanish: Recibe 10,000 de daño DoT con tu burbuja

description.english: Refresh the bubble 10 times
description.schinese: 刷新泡泡10次
description.tchinese: 刷新泡泡10次
description.french: Rafraîchissez votre bulle 10 fois
description.german: Aktualisiere deine Blase 10 Mal
description.italian: Ricarica la tua bolla 10 volte
description.japanese: 10回泡をリフレッシュする
description.spanish: Refresca tu burbuja 10 veces

description.english: Take 10,000 damage to the bubble
description.schinese: 通过泡泡吸收10,000点伤害
description.tchinese: 通過泡泡吸收10,000點傷害
description.french: Subissez 10 000 dégâts avec votre bulle
description.german: Erleide 10.000 Schaden mit deiner Blase
description.italian: Prendi 10.000 di danno con la tua bolla
description.japanese: 泡で10,000ダメージ受ける
description.spanish: Recibe 10,000 de daño con tu burbuja

description.english: Get 100 frosty turnips from the ground
description.schinese: 从地下挖掘100颗冰霜萝卜
description.tchinese: 從地下挖掘100顆冰霜蘿蔔
description.french: Extrayez 100 navets glacés du sol
description.german: Ziehe 100 frostige Rüben aus dem Boden
description.italian: Raccogli 100 rape gelate dal terreno
description.japanese: 地面から霜の降りたカブを100個抜く
description.spanish: Extrae 100 nabos helados del suelo

description.english: Keep enemies frozen for 273 seconds
description.schinese: 使敌人累计冻结273秒
description.tchinese: 使敵人累計凍結273秒

description.italian: Mantieni i nemici congelati per 273 secondi
description.japanese: 273秒間、敵を凍らせておく
description.spanish: Mantén a los enemigos congelados por 273 segundos

description.english: Kill the mini boss while frozen
description.russian: Убей мини босса во время заморозки
description.schinese: 在冰冻状态下击杀区域小首领
description.tchinese: 在冰凍狀態下擊殺區域小首領
description.french: Tuez le miniboss lorsqu'il est gelé

description.italian: Sconfiggi il miniboss mentre è congelato
description.japanese: 凍っている間にミニボスを倒す
description.spanish: Mata al minijefe mientras está congelado

description.english: Open 100 chests

description.spanish: Abre 100 cofres

description.tchinese: 收集200顆隕星石

description.english: Spend 100 seconds in quicksand

description.english: Recover 2000 health using oases
description.schinese: 通过绿洲恢复2,000点生命值
description.tchinese: 通過綠洲恢復2,000點生命值

description.english: Deal 10,000 damage using Rifts or Volcanoes

description.english: Finish off a location's boss using a rift or volcano
description.russian: Добейте босса локации с помощью разлома или вулкана

description.spanish: Acaba con un jefe de ubicación usando una grieta o volcán
